full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DMAR PO SKOR GSUM GYI BSANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,  ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES PA 'DI NI DGONGS 'DUS DMAR SKOR GSUM DANG, ,GRVA MNGON SMUG 'DZIN SGRUB THABS DANG, ,RATNA GLING PA'I MDUNG DMAR CAN DANG, DBANG GI RIL THOB DANG, ,CHOS SKYONG NOR LHA THOR BSDUS TE, ,RANG GI GRVA SLOB 'GA' 'BUM BSDUD LA 'GRO SKABS, ,AA M'AR'A GA SYE SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
